com.bfg.cart
Class Cart

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.bfg.cart.Cart
public class Cart
extends java.lang.Object

Cart is used to hold the contents of a shopping cart during a customer's session. The cart also knows how to calculate tax and shipping on an order, and how to calculate totals.

Copyright 2002, James M. Turner No warranty is made as to the fitness of this code for any particular purpose. It is included for demonstration purposes only.

Author:
James M. Turner

Method Detail

getItems

public java.util.Iterator getItems()
Returns an Iterator which will generate each CartItem in the cart.
Returns:
An Iterator which iterates over objects of type CartItem

getItem

public CartItem getItem(Product item)
Returns the CartItem for a given Product in the cart.
Parameters:
item - The product to check for in the cart.
return - The CartItem that matches that product, or null if the product is not in the cart.

addItem

public void addItem(Product item,
                    int quantity)
Add an given quantity of a given Product to the cart. If the product is already in the cart, increment the quantity rather than create a new CartItem.
Parameters:
item - The Product to add
quantity - How many of this Product to add

addPromotionItem

public void addPromotionItem(Product item,
                             int quantity)
Add an given quantity of a given Product to the cart. The CartItem will have the promotion item flag set, and will overwrite rather than add to any item already in the cart which references this product.
Parameters:
item - The Product to add
quantity - How many of this Product to add

removeItem

public void removeItem(Product item)
Remove a product entirely from the cart
Parameters:
item - The Product to remove

removePromotionItems

public void removePromotionItems()
Remove all promotional items from the cart.

countItems

public int countItems()
Returns the number of distinct products in the cart.
Returns:
Number of different products in the cart.

getTotal

public double getTotal()
Returns the total cost of the cart after promotions but before tax or shipping is calculated.
Returns:
The subtotal before shipping and tax

getTotalString

public java.lang.String getTotalString()
Returns the total cost of the cart after promotions but before tax or shipping is calculated, formatted as a currency string.
Returns:
The formatted subtotal before shipping and tax

getTax

public double getTax(Address addr)
Returns the calculated tax for the cart. If the testTaxMode property is set to "yes", the tax is calculated based on a 5% rate for Massachusetts and %10 for all other states. If the test mode is not set, the yet-to-be-integrated tax modules is called.
Parameters:
addr - The address of the customer.
Returns:
The calculated tax for the cart.

getTaxString

public java.lang.String getTaxString(Address addr)
Returns a currency-formatted version of the getTax method.
Returns:
The calculated tax for the cart as a currency string.

getShipping

public double getShipping(Address addr)
Returns the calculated shipping for the cart. If the testShippingMode property is set to "yes", the tax is calculated based on a 1.25 per item rate for Massachusetts and 2.75 per item rate for all other states. If the test mode is not set, the yet-to-be-integrated shipping modules is called.
Parameters:
addr - The address of the customer.
Returns:
The calculated shipping for the cart.

getShippingString

public java.lang.String getShippingString(Address addr)
Returns a currency-formatted version of the getShipping method.
Returns:
The calculated shipping for the cart as a currency string.

getGrandTotal

public double getGrandTotal(Address addr)
Returns the subtotal + tax and shipping for the cart.
Returns:
The grand total cost of the cart.

getGrandTotalString

public java.lang.String getGrandTotalString(Address addr)
Returns a currency-formatted version of the getGrandTotal method.
Returns:
The grand total cost for the cart as a currency string.
